info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: Arnold M. Eisen

publications.text: The Jew Within: Self, Family, and Community in America. With Steven M. Cohen. Bloomington: Indiana University Press, 2000.
Rethinking Modern Judaism: Ritual, Commandment, Community. Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1998.
Taking Hold of Torah: Jewish Commitment and Community in America. Bloomington: Indiana University Press, 1997.
Galut: Modern Jewish Reflection on Homelessness and Homecoming. Bloomington: Indiana University Press, 1986.
The Chosen People in America: A Study in Jewish Religious Ideology. Modern Jewish Experience. Bloomington: Indiana University Press, 1983.
